tag_list: social-media, entetpreneur, journalism, consultancy, internet, canada, turkiye, istanbul, toronto, dubai, uae, edelman
overview: Mustafa Ozcan is Director of Effect Digital, and has priority for establishing Edelman Digital’s affiliate Effect Digital in Turkey. After his Canada’s education period, Mustafa graduated Istanbul Kultur University Communication Arts and specialized Communication Consultancy field. Mustafa was finance journalist before he started to work as an IT journalist. His work has appeared in leading IT magazines and daily newspapers. He offered content consultancy services to various multinational clients just before to join Effect Group as Social Media Director. He also wrote a book about business professionalism.
